#summary more informations of JMapper .

= Design by contract =

In order to make the code independent from the concrete classes (JMapper and  RelationalJMapper), the framework exposes interfaces: *IJMapper* and *IRelationalJMapper*, which respectively define the contracts for JMapper and  RelationalJMapper classes.

= About raw types =

Also you can perform mapping between raw types, operations not allowed are those that provide conversion or recursive mapping.
